project.name: Hera QA Platform
project.scope: Unified test orchestration, flaky test analytics

sections.title: Project Context and QA Role
sections.goal: Establish understanding of the Hera QA Platform scope, current phase, and the QA Lead's responsibilities.
sample_questions: Can you describe the primary objectives of the Hera QA Platform in the Build phase?
What are your main responsibilities as QA Lead on this project?
How does your role interact with other departments like Platform or SRE?

sections.title: Test Strategy and Risk-Based Testing
sections.goal: Explore how the QA Lead applies risk-based testing principles in a unified test orchestration environment.
sample_questions: How do you determine which tests to prioritize under tight timelines?
Can you walk me through how RFC-1770 influenced your test selection approach?
What metrics or indicators do you use to adjust your testing scope dynamically?

sections.title: Traceability and Compliance
sections.goal: Understand how the project ensures traceability of tests to requirements in line with policy POL-QA-014.
sample_questions: How do you maintain traceability from test cases back to original requirements?
What tools or processes support you in demonstrating compliance during audits?
How do you handle changes in requirements mid-sprint with respect to traceability?

sections.title: Flaky Test Analytics and Resolution
sections.goal: Dive into the specific challenges and solutions around flaky tests in the Hera QA Platform.
sample_questions: What patterns have you identified in flaky tests across different modules?
How do you differentiate between environmental issues and code-related flakiness?
Can you give an example where RB-QA-051 helped mitigate a release risk due to flakiness?

sections.title: Cross-Project Quality Dependencies
sections.goal: Investigate interdependencies between Hera QA Platform and other portfolio projects impacting quality.
sample_questions: How does the Hera QA Platform integrate with the Helios Datalake or Nimbus Observability for test data and metrics?
Have there been any cross-project incidents where QA gaps led to production issues?
What adjustments have you made to account for upstream or downstream quality risks?

sections.title: Decision-Making under Constraints
sections.goal: Evaluate how the QA Lead makes tradeoffs between release timelines, test coverage, and risk mitigation.
sample_questions: Can you describe a situation where you had to cut test scope to meet a delivery date?
What evidence do you collect to justify such a decision to stakeholders?
How do you balance the SLA requirements with known quality debt?

sections.title: Future Improvements and Lessons Learned
sections.goal: Identify areas for process improvement and key takeaways from the Build phase.
sample_questions: If you could redesign the test orchestration from scratch, what would you change?
What lessons have you learned from implementing risk-based testing here?
How do you see the QA Platform evolving to support scaling projects?
